<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ChangeSuccessScoreGlobalUtils</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Provides access to functions for the Change success score feature that interact with global objects or functions.  To modify behavior, use this script include to override functions defined in the ChangeSuccessScoreGlobalUtilsSNC script Include.</description> <name>ChangeSuccessScoreGlobalUtils</name> <script><![CDATA[var ChangeSuccessScoreGlobalUtils = Class.create(); ChangeSuccessScoreGlobalUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(ChangeSuccessScoreGlobalUtilsSNC, { initialize: function() { ChangeSuccessScoreGlobalUtilsSNC.prototype.initialize.call(); },
type: 'ChangeSuccessScoreGlobalUtils' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-04-20 08:49:15</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1dd9bbd173181010491d235f04f6a706</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ChangeSuccessScoreGlobalUtils</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Change Management - Change Success Score Foundation" source="com.snc.change_management.change_success_score.foundation">b8af473e2f810110d8a4d5f62799b61c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1dd9bbd173181010491d235f04f6a706</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-04-23 16:07:43</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>297</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
